response.overview: Lily is a "Lost Girl", a term given to those women that have been turned into vampires at a young age. Her youthful look betrays her half-century age and she lives a drug & alcohol fueled life of sexual excess, aligned to neither the living or the undead, all the while chronicling her exploits in her forbidden diary. One night  while partying in a club built into an ancient monastery, she meets a mysterious man and, after a sensual night of partying, she accidentally drops her diary as she leaves. The young man finds the book and makes it his quest to find out where she has gone. Through his readings of the book, we live out the Lost Girlâ€™s highly erotic adventures...
response.title: The Lost Girl's Private Diary
